Name: Peach Palm Wood "Fulcrum" Container
Desc: A large cabinet made from high-quality Peach Palm Wood that can be found within the Stadium of the Sacred Flame. Their spacious interior and axially symmetric layout not only provide excellent expandability but also offer sturdy support for various equipment. The famed Sip of Xocolatl has utilized these cabinets in combination with specific tools to create an efficient beverage preparation process. This setup allows the entire shop to maintain high efficiency even during the busiest of periods, avoiding chaos in its operations.
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
